title: Grandchildren learning to value elders through relationship
description: Grandchildren learning to value elders through relationship
content:
Scenario: Grandchildren learning to value elders through relationship
    Given Margaret's care work builds deep bonds with grandchildren
    And she teaches them to respect and value older adults
    When Tommy and Emma interact with Margaret over years
    Then the family_elohim should track relationship development
    And it should recognize Margaret's role in shaping their attitudes toward elders
    And children should learn that aging doesn't diminish worth
    And they should see Margaret as capable, wise, and valuable
    And this learning will matter when Margaret needs care herself
    And next generation is being prepared to value and care for elders
    And intergenerational relationships should be mutually enriching
